org.switchyard.policy

Interface Policy

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SecurityPolicy, TransactionPolicy

    public interface Policy
    Base contract for all policy types. Every policy has a string literal representation which is used to identify the policy in application configuration (e.g. "suspendsTransaction").
    Author:
    Keith Babo © 2011 Red Hat Inc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Policy.PolicyType
      policy type.
